mapper.select: SELECT NVL(T.BADGEPOINTNAME,'뉴비') URL, U.NICKNAME NICKNAME, U.USERID USERID, J.CONTENTS CONTENTS, J.JOINDATE JOINDATE FROM POST P LEFT JOIN JOIN J ON P.POSTID = J.POSTID LEFT JOIN USER_ESSENTIAL U ON J.USERID = U.USERID LEFT JOIN USER_BADGE_LOG L ON U.BADGELOGID = L.BADGELOGID LEFT JOIN POINT T ON L.BADGEPOINTID = T.BADGEPOINTID WHERE P.POSTID = 'PT00002'
